name: broken sniper bot
description: A broken sniper bot.  Total scrap, but some stuff is still useful.

name: broken shotgun bot
description: A broken shotgun bot.  Total scrap, but some stuff is still useful.

name: broken cutthroater
description: A broken cutthroater.  Total scrap, but some stuff is still useful.
A broken Exodii Jotunn walker.  Still looks incredibly intimidating despite being permanently inoperative, due to the sheer size, mass, and protruding weapons.  Could be gutted for parts.
The automaton is now much more broken than it was before.  It resembles a pile of random parts and its internals are fried beyond salvage but could be gutted for materials.
The dead body of a changeling.  There are multiple bites across the body and numerous scratches.  It looks like blood loss might have brought them down.

snippet_category.text: The dead body of a changeling.  There are multiple bites across the body and numerous scratches.  It looks like blood loss might have brought them down.
Extreme burns cover the body of this changeling.  In multiple locations the charring goes all the way to the bone.
Several ballistic wounds seem to have brought down this changeling.  It probably happened elsewhere and they escaped to here.
This lifeless body is covered in a rime of frost, that seems resistant to the prevailing weather.
This changeling seems to have gotten themselves impaled upon an unhealthy number of large thorns.  What kind of plant could do this?
This changeling corpse has a belly wound that appears to be caused by a sword and is also missing its hand.

description: Your body, lying on the ground while your spirit walks free.  Hopefully nothing happens to it while you're gone.
